title: FS: Manning Batting mini-run with Hindu - TRADED
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: Manning Batting mini-run with Hindu - TRADED
posts.post_content:
These little projects get me off track, so I'm nipping it in the bud.  The remaining "confirmed" cards shouldn't be that tough, but there is the "possible" EPDG.  Note that the graded population of the Hindu is a mere 5 combined between PSA and SGC.

Asking $200 delivered.  Note that the Hindu, in addition to the mark, does have a pin hole.
